sqlMap.select:
select
from SF_MATERIALS_TRANSFER where 1=1
ENTRUST_ID=#dattr1#
ENTRUST_ID=#dattr5#
SF_MATERIALS_TRANSFER.ND = #nd#
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_TODO where executor=#executor# and instance_id = SF_MATERIALS_TRANSFER.process_inst_id)
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_UNTREAD where executor=#executor# and instance_id = SF_MATERIALS_TRANSFER.process_inst_id)
( exists (select WF_DRAFT_NAME from as_wf_draft where user_id=#executor# and compo_id=#wfcompoId# and WF_DRAFT_ID=SF_MATERIALS_TRANSFER.process_inst_id) or SF_MATERIALS_TRANSFER.process_inst_id = -1 ) and SF_MATERIALS_TRANSFER.STATUS ='daiYiJiao'
(SF_MATERIALS_TRANSFER.STATUS='yiJIeShou')
1=1
order by TRANSFER_ID desc
